description: Raster layer containing population number per pixel for the year 2015. Raw data was retrieved from Global Human Settlements (GHS) 2018.

Linear distance to the closest commercial facility in meters. Distances were estimated using R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing version 3.4.4 (2018-03-15) and the Package Raster: Geographic Data Analysis and Modeling version 2.6-7. Raw data retrived from: Spatial points with the location of commercial facilities, data from WB CPL dataset and OSM 2017.
Raster layer containing radiance per pixel for the year 2015. Raw data was retrieved from National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) 2018.

Linear distance to the closest traditional market in meters. Distances were estimated using R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing version 3.4.4 (2018-03-15) and the Package Raster: Geographic Data Analysis and Modeling version 2.6-7. Raw data retrived from: Spatial points with the location of traditional markets, data from WB CPL dataset.
